name: 3D Pinball Space Cadet for Modern Windows
name_original: 3D Pinball Space Cadet for Modern Windows
description:
Ever wanted to play 3D Pinball but realized that it was only available in Windows 9x and XP But you really wanted to play it on your own PC?

Well, I decided to rip the game's files from my Windows XP VM and decided to try to play the game and... It worked perfectly fine! So I decided to upload it to share so everyone can play Pinball even if they didn't want to use an emulator or Virtual Machine.

Minimum Requirements: Windows 9x+, 32MB ram, 4MB Storage free, A CPU from the last 20 years. 

Recommended Requirements: Windows 9x+, 64 MB RAM, 8MB Storage free, A CPU From the last 15 years.

Keybinds:

  • Left Flipper = Z
  • Right Flipper = /
  • Left Table Bump: X
  • Bottom Table Bump: Up Arrow
  • Right Table Bump: Period
  • Plunger: Space
